Articles.Content: So I'm new to kethane and I've only just built my second drill probe. Problem is the second one I built won't convert kethane to liquid fuel or oxidizer but it does convert to monopropellant. What am I doing wrong?

Hmm, in all the time I've used Kethane, I haven't had a problem like this myself.

My recommendation is to simply make sure your Kethane is up-to-date, and especially if it is not, re-install it completely and try again. Be sure to backup everything unless you want to potentially start over... which nobody much likes to do.

I haven't checked in a while, but everything in here should still be valid: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35664-Kethane-Usage-and-Proper-Fuel-Routing

The short answer is, if you don't have a direct connection between your converter and fuel tanks then you need to put fuel lines going from the tank to the converter.
